name: Barcarola Hotel
description:
A charming four-star hotel located directly in front of Sant Pol beach, offering beautiful Mediterranean sea views and a calm, relaxing atmosphere.

The hotel combines traditional coastal style with modern comforts. Rooms are bright, comfortable, and well-equipped, many with private balconies overlooking the sea.

Thanks to its beachfront location and 24-hour reception, it is an ideal choice for couples, families, and travelers looking to enjoy the beach with total convenience.

name: Eden Roc Hotel
description:
A modern four-star hotel set in the exclusive Punta Port Salvi area, surrounded by nature and offering stunning coastal views.

The hotel features several outdoor pools, a full spa and wellness center, and direct access to small rocky coves perfect for swimming and snorkeling.

With spacious rooms, Mediterranean cuisine, and a peaceful setting, Eden Roc is ideal for travelers seeking luxury, relaxation, and privacy.

The hotel offers clean and cozy rooms with essential amenities such as air conditioning and free Wi-Fi, making it a practical option for city stays.

Its central location is perfect for visitors who want to explore the town on foot and experience local life.

name: Sant Pol Hotel
description:
A friendly three-star hotel situated in a quiet residential area just a short walk from Sant Pol beach.

The hotel offers comfortable rooms in a relaxed Mediterranean style and is especially popular with families and couples.

Its peaceful location, combined with easy access to the beach and town center, makes it an excellent choice for a calm and pleasant stay.

name: Hostal del Sol Hotel
description:
A cozy two-star hostal offering a warm and authentic Catalan hospitality experience in a quiet residential neighborhood.

Rooms are simple, clean, and comfortable, ideal for travelers who value atmosphere and personal service over luxury.

Perfect for budget-conscious visitors, solo travelers, and backpackers looking for a genuine and friendly place to stay.

name: Confortel Hotel
description:
An elegant four-star hotel located on the seafront promenade, offering comfort, style, and spectacular views of the Mediterranean.

The hotel features modern rooms, a complete spa and wellness center, and high-quality dining options.

Its prime location and premium services make it ideal for travelers seeking luxury, relaxation, and direct access to the seaside.
